about.title: About NEOBIZE
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner
about.description: NEOBIZE is a versatile company offering services in three key areas: web and mobile development, transport and logistics, as well as construction and civil engineering. Our mission is to provide innovative and quality solutions to meet the diverse needs of our clients.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Founded in 2012, NEOBIZE was born from a bold vision: to build a dynamic and versatile company delivering high-quality services across multiple industries. What began as a small initiative driven by passion and innovation has since evolved into a trusted name with a strong presence in key sectors such as web and mobile development, transportation, and construction. Over the years, our team has grown with talented professionals who share our values of excellence, integrity, and adaptability. At NEOBIZE, we believe in the power of technology and strategic execution to transform businesses and communities. Whether we're developing tailored digital solutions, optimizing logistics for modern transport, or executing ambitious construction projects, we are driven by the same purpose: delivering value through quality, innovation, and reliability. Our cross-industry expertise allows us to provide integrated services that respond to the complex needs of our clients. We take pride in our ability to adapt to market evolutions and anticipate future demands, positioning NEOBIZE as a forward-thinking partner for businesses looking to grow and thrive in a digital and connected world. As we continue to expand, our mission remains unchanged: to empower clients by delivering cutting-edge solutions and impactful services that shape a better tomorrow.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide innovative and quality solutions to meet the diverse needs of our clients, combining technical expertise, exceptional customer service and commitment to excellence.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We aspire to become a recognized leader in our fields of activity, constantly pushing the boundaries of innovation and creating value for our clients, our employees and society.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team consists of passionate and experienced professionals dedicated to the success of your project.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in all our projects and services, exceeding our clients' expectations.

innovation.title: Innovation

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We act with honesty, transparency and ethics in all our professional interactions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? Check our FAQ below.

questions.question: How do I request a quote?
questions.answer: You can request a quote by filling out our contact form or calling us directly. We will respond within 24 business hours.

questions.question: What are your delivery timeframes?
questions.answer: Our timeframes vary depending on the complexity of the project. We establish a precise schedule during the planning phase and we commit to respecting it.

questions.question: Do you work internationally?
questions.answer: Yes, we work with clients from all over the world. Our team is able to communicate in several languages and we adapt our services to local specificities.

questions.question: Do you offer maintenance services?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer maintenance and support services for all our projects. We offer different packages adapted to your needs and budget.
